methods.name: search-global
methods.description:
Search objects across all spaces
Error Responses:
401: Unauthorized
500: Internal server error

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

limit.description: The number of items to return

query.description: The text to search within object names and content; use types field for type filtering

sort.description: The sorting options for the search results

direction.description: The direction to sort the search results by

property_key.description: The key of the property to sort the search results by

types.description: The types of objects to include in results (e.g., "page", "task", "bookmark"); see ListTypes endpoint for valid values

data.description: The list of items in the current result set

object.description: The data model of the object

properties.description: The properties of the object

object.description: The data model of the object

select.description: The selected tag id, if applicable

multi_select.description: The selected tag ids, if applicable

date.description: The date value in ISO 8601 format, if applicable

phone.description: The phone number value, if applicable

snippet.description: The snippet of the object, especially important for notes as they don't have a name

space_id.description: The id of the space the object is in

id.description: The id of the type (which is unique across spaces)

key.description: The key of the type (can be the same across spaces for known types)

object.description: The data model of the object

plural_name.description: The plural name of the type

properties.description: The properties linked to the type

format.description: The format of the property used for filtering

object.description: The data model of the object

pagination.description: The pagination metadata for the response

has_more.description: Indicates if there are more items available beyond the current result set

limit.description: The maximum number of items returned in the result set

offset.description: The number of items skipped before starting to collect the result set

total.description: The total number of items available for the endpoint

outputSchema.description: The list of objects matching the search criteria

methods.description:
List spaces
Error Responses:

500: Internal server error

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

limit.description: The number of items to return

gateway_url.description: The gateway url to serve files and media

network_id.description: The network id of the space

object.description: The data model of the object

pagination.description: The pagination metadata for the response

has_more.description: Indicates if there are more items available beyond the current result set

limit.description: The maximum number of items returned in the result set

offset.description: The number of items skipped before starting to collect the result set

total.description: The total number of items available for the endpoint

outputSchema.description: The list of spaces accessible by the authenticated user

methods.name: add-list-objects

Add objects to list
Error Responses:

429: Rate limit exceeded
500: Internal server error

objects.description: The list of object IDs to add to the list
